title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' functionality does not always work. After closing all editors, creating a new file f1.txt, and selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: The expected behavior is that when 'Close All Saved' is selected from the file menu, all the open editors should be closed, including the newly created file f1.txt.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Use build 20020508 with the latest UI code. 2. Close all editors. 3. Create a new file f1.txt. 4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
